title: The.Dressmaker.2015.1080p.10bit.BluRay.6CH.x265.HEVC-PSA
description:
Release Note : Thereâ€™s a FPS difference between these release and others which used GECKOS as source. So if you want to sync your subtitle with this, you have to change FPS 23.97 to 24 and resync the time to -00:00:13.500



Use latest MPC-HC , VLC , KMPlayer, Gom Player , or any other modern player to play X265 .
Please note that x265 requires more resources for adequate playback . if your audio is out of sync , then your machine can't handle it .
So be sure to have a strong PC or device to play it .
If you only have audio and no video , then please update your player .




Be sure to check out our website for more releases and exclusive downloads .
